articles.title: Stellantis abandons hydrogen fuel cell development
articles.description: Fast filling times are seductive, but they don’t compensate for H2’s many drawbacks.
articles.content:
To paraphrase Mean Girls, "stop trying to make hydrogen happen."
For some years now, detractors of battery electric vehicles have held up hydrogen as a clean fuel panacea. That sometimes refers to hydrogen combustion engines, but more often, it's hyd... [1053 chars]
